african_regional_organizations.name: African Organisation for Standardisation
african_regional_organizations.purpose: To harmonize African standards and conformity assessment procedures.

african_regional_organizations.name: African Union
african_regional_organizations.purpose: To promote unity and solidarity of African states and act as a collective voice for the African continent.

african_regional_organizations.name: Economic Community of Central African States
african_regional_organizations.purpose: To promote economic cooperation and collective autonomy among the members.

african_regional_organizations.name: Conseil de l'Entente
african_regional_organizations.purpose: To foster economic and political cooperation among member states.

african_regional_organizations.name: Economic Community of West African States
african_regional_organizations.purpose: To promote economic integration and cooperation among its members.

african_regional_organizations.name: East African Community
african_regional_organizations.purpose: To foster the economic, social, and political integration of its member states.

african_regional_organizations.name: West African Economic and Monetary Union
african_regional_organizations.purpose: To promote economic integration among countries that share a common currency, the West African CFA franc.

african_regional_organizations.name: Southern African Development Community
african_regional_organizations.purpose: To further socio-economic cooperation and integration as well as political and security cooperation among its members.

african_regional_organizations.name: Intergovernmental Authority on Development
african_regional_organizations.purpose: To assist and complement the efforts of its member states to achieve development.

african_regional_organizations.name: Arab Maghreb Union
african_regional_organizations.purpose: To promote cooperation and economic integration in the Maghreb region.

african_regional_organizations.name: International Conference on the Great Lakes Region
african_regional_organizations.purpose: To facilitate cooperation in peace and security, democracy and good governance, economic development, and regional integration.

african_regional_organizations.name: African Ministers Council on Water
african_regional_organizations.members: Member states of the African Union
african_regional_organizations.purpose: To provide political leadership, policy direction, and advocacy in water management and provision in Africa.
